languages.text: "Выдохни, Терций. Уже нет времени описывать что-то еще. Просто давай сюда отчет, и мы проводим тебя к шаттлам — тихо и мирно".
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
languages.original_text: "Выдохни, Терций. Уже нет времени описывать что-то еще. Просто давай сюда отчет, и мы проводим тебя к шаттлам — тихо и мирно".

traits.locale_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."
"Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

languages.text: «Relájese, Tertius. No hay tiempo para ampliar el inventario. Denos el informe y le llevaremos hasta las lanzaderas sin ningún problema».
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: «Relájese, Tertius. No hay tiempo para ampliar el inventario. Denos el informe y le llevaremos hasta las lanzaderas sin ningún problema».

languages.text: “别紧张，特蒂乌斯。现在已经没时间进一步清点资源了，赶紧把报告交给我们，你就可以上穿梭机了。”
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: “别紧张，特蒂乌斯。现在已经没时间进一步清点资源了，赶紧把报告交给我们，你就可以上穿梭机了。”

languages.text: 「落ち着け、ターティウス。追加でインベントリを作成している時間はない。ただその報告書を渡せば、問題なくシャトルに連れて行くつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着け、ターティウス。追加でインベントリを作成している時間はない。ただその報告書を渡せば、問題なくシャトルに連れて行くつもりだ」

languages.text: « Calmez-vous, Tertius. Nous n'avons plus de temps à consacrer à la poursuite de l'inventaire. Remettez-nous ce rapport, et nous vous escorterons gentiment jusqu'aux navettes. »
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Calmez-vous, Tertius. Nous n'avons plus de temps à consacrer à la poursuite de l'inventaire. Remettez-nous ce rapport, et nous vous escorterons gentiment jusqu'aux navettes. »

languages.text: "Sakin ol Tertius. Envanter sayımı için vaktimiz yok. Raporu ver, biz de seni sorunsuzca mekiğe götürelim."
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Sakin ol Tertius. Envanter sayımı için vaktimiz yok. Raporu ver, biz de seni sorunsuzca mekiğe götürelim."

languages.text: "Entspannt Euch, Tertius. Für eine weitere Bestandsaufnahme bleibt keine Zeit. Gebt uns einfach den Bericht, dann bringen wir Euch zu den Shuttles."
languages.original_text: "Relax, Tertius. There is no time for any further inventory-taking. Just give us the report, and we will take you to the shuttles without any trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Entspannt Euch, Tertius. Für eine weitere Bestandsaufnahme bleibt keine Zeit. Gebt uns einfach den Bericht, dann bringen wir Euch zu den Shuttles."
